all right crafters that make this magical substance you're going to need a

some sealable plastic bags so you'll want to put the clay in a sealable

insurance that your clay won't dry out on you so my personal favorite cold
porcelain recipe is one cup of corn starch one cup of white glue one
tablespoon of baby oil or olive oil I use baby oil one tablespoon of lemon
juice or vinegar and I used vinegar so yeah that's just all you need and I'll
